articles.content: Launching August 1st for $9.99 each

articles.author: Richard Scott-Jones
articles.title: This EVE Online player report was so good the devs thought they had a leak - PCGamesN
articles.description: The Arataka Research Consortium's work was so good "I had to read it twice just to be sure what was going on", the devs tell us
articles.content:
A consortium of EVE Online players produced a report on the game’s latest galactic threat that was so good, so comprehensive, and – perhaps – so accurate, that the developers feared they had a leak.
